text:
@LindseyGrahamSC And Over 300,000 Working Fathers.Out of Work For Covid-19 and  who pay child support every week directly out of their check DID NOT get their $ 1200 Stimulus. 
Because No One in the Senate Thought to Put A Clause in So The States Couldnt Intercept The payment For Back support..
